long description: UNLIMITED FREE data & calls while travelling in US, UAE and Singapore! -- In 37 other countries, enjoy FREE incoming calls, outgoing calls @Rs1/min -- Data @Rs1/MB -- Outgoing SMS @Rs.15/sms in all countries -- Applicable on select networks.

Incoming calls @ Rs 39/min -- Data @ Rs 39/MB -- Outgoing within visited country @ Rs 19.5/min -- Outgoing outside the visited country @ Rs 39/min -- SMS @ Rs 15/sms -- Applicable across popular destinations like Singapore, Thailand, Malaysia, USA, UK and UAE and more countries on select network operators only.
